page.title: 19Population and Travel
page.content:
We did a survey of where we were born. Every year out-of-county families come to settle here attracted by Perran's beauty and the relative cheapness of property.They also seek an alernative to the pressures of urban life.Cornw- all is an area of very high unemploy- ment with 20% of the working populat- ion on the dole.For this reason many families are forced to leave after only a short stay.It is a place with a fluctuating population.
Place of Birth:Treliske,Truro - 16. Out-of-County - 6.
Travel:Plane - 6,Train - 18,Bus - 12, Car - 17,Boat - 5,Helicopter - 2.These are for long journeys only.
Countries:France,Spain,Germany,Portuga l,Scotland and Wales.
